article_title: City Of Sioux Falls To Announce Major Renovations To 5 Area Parks
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

The mayor of Sioux Falls, along with a park development specialist, will announce Monday the five parks they think need the most improvement in the area.

The City of Sioux Falls will hold a press conference Monday, June 29 at 2 p.m. at Lacey Park. Mayor Mike Huether and park development specialist Tony Miedema will reveal the renovations being made to five different parks in the city.

The parks have needed major repair, and the press conference will detail the work being done, as well as when it will be done.
